[Page Title: Best Burgers & Happy Hour in Charleston | Big Gun Burger Shop & Bar]

top of page Charlestonâ€™s favorite bar for gourmet burgers and late night eats where low key is how we like it. - SERIOUS BURGERS FOR FILTHY EATERS - OPEN HOURS OPEN DAILY 12PM - 2AM KITCHEN HOURS Sun - Thu: 12PM - 11PM Fri & Sat: 12PM - 1AM LOCATION 137 Calhoun St Between King & Meeting Street Charleston, SC (843) 789-3821 MENU ORDER HERE THE HAPPIEST HOUR If cold beer, crafted cocktails and bold bites is how you like to end the day, grab your friends because this is the happy hour for you. MON - FRI, 4 to 6PM $3 Tacos (Pork or Vegan)
